fields.hint: Choose HIV Risk Assessment Questions Category

fields.label: Is the biological mother HIV positive?

v_required.err: You're required to check the box

fields.label: Are one or both biological parents deceased due to chronic illness or HIV?
Are any biological siblings deceased due to chronic illness or HIV?
Does the child have any TB symptoms including cough, fever, weight loss/poor weight gain, or night sweats?
In the last 6 months, has the child been sick more than other children or been admitted to hospital?
Has the child had frequent rashes or other skin problems?
Has the child had discharge from his or her ear?
Is the primary caregiver a female sex worker? (Do not ask question directly. Probe)
Have you ever been sexually active?
Have you had sex with someone whose HIV status you did not know, or who was HIV-positive?
Have you ever had more than one sexual partner in the same month?
Do you have any of the following on your private parts: sores, blisters, or unusual discharge?
Have you ever had transactional sex?
Have you ever been sexually abused/raped?
Have you been tested for HIV in the past year because you were concerned you may be positive?
Have you ever had an issue with substance abuse that led to risky sexual behaviors?
Have you ever been married?
Have you ever given birth or been pregnant?
Are you currently pregnant or breastfeeding?
Did the VCA have a YES to at least one of the above questions?
